original_text: There was not a needy person among them, for as many as were owners of lands or houses sold them and brought the proceeds of what was sold
korean_text: 그 중에 가난한 사람이 없으니 이는 밭과 집 있는 자는 팔아 그 판 것의 값을 가져다가

sentences.original_text: There was not a needy person among them
for as many as were owners of lands or houses
and brought the proceeds of what was sold
